title: LightGBM on Meta-Features
description: OVERVIEWIn this notebook, we will check if there is any predictive power in the meta-features that can be extracted from the DCM images. We will write a function to extract a few meta-features and pixel-based features taking advantage of the parallelization and build a cross-validation based LightGBM pipeline to predict one image-level and nine exam-level labels.
description_lemmatized: overviewin notebook check predictive power metafeatures extracted dcm image write function extract metafeatures pixelbased feature taking advantage parallelization build crossvalidation based lightgbm pipeline predict one imagelevel nine examlevel label
